english.segment1: Verse 1. I woke up in darkness. sounded by silence. oh where, where have I gone?
english.segment2: I woke to reality. losing its grip on me. oh where, where have I gone?
english.segment3: Cause I can see the light. before I see the sunrise
english.segment4: Chorus. You called and you shouted. broke through my deafness. now Im breathing in. and breathing out. Im alive again!
english.segment5: You shattered my darkness. washed away my blindness. now Im breathing in. and breathing out. Im alive again!
english.segment6: Verse 2. They never loved you. you waited for me, I searched for you…. what took me so long?
english.segment7: I was looking outside. as a love would ever want to hide. Im finding I was wrong
english.segment8: Cause I can feel the wind. before it hits my skin
english.segment9: Bridge. Cause I want you!. Yes, I want you, I need you. And Ill do what ever I have to. Just to get through. cause I love you. Yeah, I love you!
